To those of you that can't install it. Mount the image using alcohol120% or burn it to a DVD. Look in the folder for an .nfo file, that has the serial in it, type one of those in at first install, install the game (you need at least 4GB free).
Then copy the crack over the exe in the godfather folder on your C: drive. Then play the game.

in the autorun folder, there is an autorun.cfg file
open that file with notepad and change the line "DirectXVersion=9.0c" to "DirectXVersion=0". Close and save the file, and rerun the autorun.exe, the game should now install
